sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'
import { View, Text, Picker } from 'react-native'
import SwitchSelector from 'react-native-switch-selector'
import { Context } from '../App'
import NavigationBar from '../components/NavigationBar'

export default function SettingsPage() {
  const [playerCount, setPlayerCount] = useState(4)
  return (
    <Context.Consumer>{(context) => (
      <View style={{ flex: 1 }}>
        <View style={{ flex: 9 }}>
          <View style={{ flex: 1, alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', backgroundColor: '#cc0066' }}>
            <View>
              <Text>Mode:</Text>
            </View>
            <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row' }}>
              <SwitchSelector
                initial={0}
                onPress={(value) => context.mode=value as string}
                textColor='black'
                selectedColor='white'
                buttonColor='#cc0066'
                borderColor='black'
                borderRadius={20}
                hasPadding={true}
                options={[
                  { label: 'NORMAL', value: 'normal' },
                  { label: 'EXTREME', value: 'extreme' }
                ]}
              />
            </View>
          </View>
          <View style={{ flex: 1, alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', backgroundColor: 'white' }}>
            <View>
              <Text>Number of Players:</Text>
            </View>
            <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row' }}>
              <Picker selectedValue={playerCount}
                onValueChange={(value) => {}}>
                  {/*setPlayerCount(value as number)
                  context.playerCount = value as number * 1 }}>  multiply by 1 to force cast into number, otherwise string */}
                <Picker.Item key='4' label='4' value='4'/>
                <Picker.Item key='5' label='5' value='5'/>
                <Picker.Item key='6' label='6' value='6'/>
                <Picker.Item key='7' label='7' value={7} />
                <Picker.Item key='8' label='8' value={8} />
                <Picker.Item key='9' label='9' value={9} />
                <Picker.Item key='10' label='10' value={10} />
                <Picker.Item key='11' label='11' value={11} />
                <Picker.Item key='12' label='12' value={12} />
                <Picker.Item key='13' label='13' value={13} />
                <Picker.Item key='14' label='14' value={14} />
                <Picker.Item key='15' label='15' value={15} />
                <Picker.Item key='16' label='16' value={16} />
              </Picker>
            </View>
          </View>
        </View>
        <View style={{ flex: 1 }}>
          <NavigationBar Previous='StartPage' Next='IntroductionPage'></NavigationBar>
        </View>
      </View>
    )}</Context.Consumer>
  )
}
